content:
StandardBindingElement Class

In this Article

Provides a base class for the configuration elements that specify predefined bindings provided by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class StandardBindingElement : System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelConfigurationElement, System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IBindingConfigurationElement

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ConfigurationElement
  • System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelConfigurationElement
  • StandardBindingElement

Inherited Members

Remarks

This class defines a binding configuration element that can be used to describe an aspect of how an endpoint communicates with others in the network.

Constructors summary

StandardBindingElement()

Initializes a new instance of the StandardBindingElement class.
StandardBindingElement(String)

Initializes a new instance of the StandardBindingElement class with the specified name.

Properties summary

BindingElementType

When overridden in a derived class, gets the Type object that represents the custom binding element.
CloseTimeout

Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a close operation to complete.
Name

Gets or sets the name of the binding.
OpenTimeout

Gets or sets the interval of time provided for an open operation to complete.
Properties

Gets a ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.
ReceiveTimeout

Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a receive operation to complete.
SendTimeout

Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a send operation to complete.

Methods summary

ApplyConfiguration(Binding)

Applies the content of the specified binding to this binding configuration element.
InitializeFrom(Binding)

Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding.
OnApplyConfiguration(Binding)

Called when the content of a specified binding element is applied to this binding configuration element.
Reset(ConfigurationElement)

Resets the internal state of this configuration element object, including the locks and the properties collections.

Constructors

  • StandardBindingElement()

    Initializes a new instance of the StandardBindingElement class.

    protected StandardBindingElement ();
  • StandardBindingElement(String)

    Initializes a new instance of the StandardBindingElement class with the specified name.

    protected StandardBindingElement (string name);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      A name that uniquely identifies this configuration element.

Properties

  • BindingElementType

    When overridden in a derived class, gets the Type object that represents the custom binding element.

    protected abstract Type BindingElementType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      A Type object that represents the custom binding type.

  • CloseTimeout

    Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a close operation to complete.

    public TimeSpan CloseTimeout { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The TimeSpan that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.

  • Name

    Gets or sets the name of the binding.

    public string Name { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the binding.

    Remarks

    Each instance of a binding has a name and namespace that together uniquely identify it in the metadata of the service.

  • OpenTimeout

    Gets or sets the interval of time provided for an open operation to complete.

    public TimeSpan OpenTimeout { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The TimeSpan that specifies how long the open operation has to complete before timing out.

  • Properties

    Gets a ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

    protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }

    Property Value

    • ConfigurationPropertyCollection

      A ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

  • ReceiveTimeout

    Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a receive operation to complete.

    public TimeSpan ReceiveTimeout { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The TimeSpan that specifies how long the receive operation has to complete before timing out.

  • SendTimeout

    Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a send operation to complete.

    public TimeSpan SendTimeout { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The TimeSpan that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.

Methods

  • ApplyConfiguration(Binding)

    Applies the content of the specified binding to this binding configuration element.

    public void ApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding);

    Parameters

    • binding
      Binding

      A binding.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      binding is null.

    • ArgumentException

      The type of this binding element is different from the type specified by binding.

    Remarks

    The Name of the standard binding specified in binding is ignored during this operation. This is because the Name attribute of a binding is used in conjunction with the Namespace attribute of the same binding to generate the correct WSDL for a binding. However, the Name property of this type is mainly used as a key to identify this binding element in the binding collection. Therefore, the Name property is not modified during this operation.

  • InitializeFrom(Binding)

    Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding.

    protected virtual void InitializeFrom (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding);

    Parameters

    • binding
      Binding

      A binding.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      binding is null.

    • ArgumentException

      The type of this binding element is different from the type specified by binding.

  • OnApplyConfiguration(Binding)

    Called when the content of a specified binding element is applied to this binding configuration element.

    protected abstract void OnApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding);

    Parameters

    • binding
      Binding

      A binding.

  • Reset(ConfigurationElement)

    Resets the internal state of this configuration element object, including the locks and the properties collections.

    protected override void Reset (System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement parentElement);

    Parameters

    • parentElement
      ConfigurationElement

      The parent node of this configuration element.
